abstract: General Electric is launching a $250 million equity fund to invest in media and technology companies, part of a broader push by traditional media companies to get into hot areas such as digital advertising or social networks.
lead_paragraph: General Electric is launching a $250 million equity fund to invest in media and technology companies, part of a broader push by traditional media companies to get into hot areas such as digital advertising or social networks.

headline.main: G.E. and NBC Launch $250 Million Media Fund
